alert.note: Alert for Christian; Douglas; Stone; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 8:21PM CDT until July 14 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Douglas County in southwestern Missouri... Taney County in southwestern Missouri... Southeastern Christian County in southwestern Missouri... Stone County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 821 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Highlandville to near Hollister to 6 miles west of Roberson Hollow, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Branson, Lake Taneycomo, Table Rock Lake, Bull Shoals Lake, Table Rock State Park, Shepherd of the Hills State Park, Hollister, Silver Dollar City, Kimberling City, Forsyth, Merriam Woods, Kissee Mills, Reeds Spring, Highlandville, Rockaway Beach, Bull Creek, Indian Point, Branson West, Galena and Taneyville. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Springfield. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
